documents.document: Hey @DellAustralia @AlienwareOz Trying to give you money, but your salespeople have no ability to actually sell me a desktop without the bundled monitor, mouse and keyboard. Why can you discount a bundle, but not the desktop with the same specs by itself? #Dell #Alienware

Hey @thaRadBrad Wish to say thankyou for what you do, being humble and being you throughout the past decade. I started watching your channel in May 2011, 10 YEARS, Alan Wake, have followed ever since. Never stop gaming. #TheRadBrad #gaming #gameplay #walkthrough
@GameSpot Well what's the point of releasing a patch then?
I'll end up buying #IndianaJones on #4K Ultra HD Bluray when they are available separately. Only want two of the four films.
I really need to get around to watching my #StarWars #4K Ultra HD Blurays. Bought Episodes 4, 5, 6 and Rogue One. The good ones.
I think more people are starting to realise the negative aspects of #Retirnal's game design without one save state being available.

Sure those #PS5 #Nike sneakers look cool but supply won't meet demand. Lot of scalpers. Might need to wait for the knockoffs to appear. Unless @AskPlayStation @PlayStationAU could secure me one, happy to pay now for them.
Sometimes I just wear #headphones or #earbuds with nothing playing to give the impression I can't hear people around me. And for them to not be able to talk to me.
@IGN Bad move. This is why they should have had one save state.

If you're looking to download #YouTube videos which have #HDR, the best file format I have used is webm.

Just created a Take Profit order for #dogecoin. $5,000 Aud per #doge holding. Why? Because why not. Retirement or nothing. Always invest what you're prepared to lose. Never sell for a measly taxable profit. Beyond Diamond hands. Beyond the Moon, Mars and Pluto.

I loved the 1.33:1 aspect ratio for Zack Snyder's #JusticeLeagueSnyderCut and wish that all films which are released, or intended to be released in @IMAX, maintain this ratio for the home viewing experience. Or at least switch to 16:9 if not possible.

As much as I wanted PlayStation VR 2 (#PSVR2) to be a complete wireless experience like Oculus Quest, for budget specification efficiency it will leverage off the #PS5's hardware with a single cord. I don't mind, the hardware will be a leap from the original. No camera.

Don't be too fixed on acquiring a #PS5 or #XBox #SeriesX. The #PS4 and #XBoxOneX have dropped in price (console #games) which make for good entertainment and now a mass library of games. Good deals still to be had.
@LastStandMedia Absolutely onboard with these credentials.
@PlayStationAU Ni No Kuni II through the PS5. Still clearing that PS4 backlog.

@The_CrapGamer This is all well and good, but the game needs to appeal to the mass audience also. The technical aspects of a game is one thing, but to entertain your audience and leaving them wanting more is another. Games dont need to be technical marvels on every occasion.

Having fun at the moment experimenting with #4K AI upscailing but wish I had a better computer to process the video faster. There is something cool about taking a 30fps DVD video (or lower in resolution) and making it 4K 60fps.

Yes I bought #dogecoin Yes I HODL Dogecoin I'll only sell if it is enough for me to retire, which let's face it, is a rocket past the Moon, Mars and Pluto. Otherwise happy to let the investment be at a loss or Nil valued. Still, the #crypto and community is fun.

It's been nice to #game without the need to record #gameplay do editing for #walkthrough #YouTube upload. It's a more sense of calm, and not needing to feel like you need to impress. I will keep doing #gaming videos, but may scale back to select games and not all.
So far we have had the following #PS5 #games through #PSPlus Oddworld Soulstorm Wreckfest Bugsnax Control Maneater Destruction AllStars Maquette Not bad for a start.
#XboxSeriesS with #Xbox #Gamepass makes for a excellent #gaming package if you want a console for travelling or a holiday with.

The landscape of purchasing individual #games, at launch or post, has changed dramatically with #Xbox #Gamepass and #PlayStation #PSPlus. I purchase games once a year now during the Boxing Day sales, the rest are through these subscriptions and my game backlog.

Those complaining about #PSPlus #games need to remember that you're paying, in Australia for example, $2.92 per game (24 games per year) at $69.95 annual subscription. Even less when there is 25% off the cost of subscription, or when three games are available per month.
RT @digitalfoundry: Genshin Impact received a native PS5 update this week, and here's @cataferal to tell us all about it, along with PS4 Pr
Hi @Housemarque I get the #gameplay mechanic of #Returnal, wouldn't change it, but you need to introduce availability of one save state. Make the game better for the player, give them the option.

Don't forget to add #OddworldSoulstorm to your #PSPlus library, and #Wreckfest next month, through the #PlayStation site even if you do not have a #PS5 yet. By adding to the library it will become available for download when you do get a #PlayStation5.
@PlayStationAU Bit worried here. GTA V is in the three spot.
@IGN Hope so, season three just didn't feel like CastleVania.
@IGN Yeh F that
